listId.description: The unique identifier of the access list.

configurationId.description: The unique identifier of the access list configuration.

name.description: The display name of the access list.

description.description: Optional description of the access list's purpose or contents.

isEnabled.description: Indicates whether the access list is currently enabled and active.

entryCount.description: The total number of entries currently in the access list.

updateFrequency.description: How frequently the list is updated from its source. Only applicable to managed lists.

lastUpdated.description: The timestamp when the access list was last updated.

AccessListDetails.description: Represents detailed information about an access list and its configuration.

managedLists.description: List of curated threat lists maintained by Bunny Shield with automatic updates.

customLists.description: List of custom access lists created and maintained by the user.

customEntryCount.description: Total number of entries across all custom access lists for this Shield Zone.

customEntryLimit.description: Maximum number of entries allowed across all custom access lists based on the Shield plan.

customListCount.description: Current number of custom access lists for this Shield Zone.

customListLimit.description: Maximum number of custom access lists allowed based on the Shield plan.

AccessListsDetailsResponse.description: Response containing comprehensive access list information for a Shield Zone, including both managed and custom lists.

name.description: The display name for the new access list.

description.description: Optional description of the access list's purpose or contents.

content.description: The initial content for the access list with entries separated by newlines.

checksum.description: SHA-256 checksum of the content for integrity verification. If null, it will be automatically calculated.

CreateCustomAccessListRequest.description: Request model for creating a new custom access list.

id.description: The unique identifier of the custom access list.

name.description: The display name of the custom access list.

description.description: Optional description of the access list's purpose or contents.

content.description: The raw content of the access list with entries separated by newlines.

checksum.description: SHA-256 checksum of the content for integrity verification.

entryCount.description: The total number of entries in the access list.

lastModified.description: The timestamp when the access list was last modified.

CustomAccessList.description: Represents a custom access list associated with a shield zone.

CustomAccessListResponse.description: Response containing custom access list data or error information.

success.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

message.description: Human-readable message describing the result of the operation.

errorKey.description: Unique error key for programmatic error handling, if applicable.

GenericRequestResponse.description: Generic response object containing status information for API operations.

isEnabled.description: Whether the access list should be enabled or disabled. If null, the current state is preserved.

UpdateAccessListConfigurationRequest.description: Request model for updating an access list configuration.

UpdateAccessListConfigurationResponse.description: Response containing the updated access list configuration data or error information.

name.description: The new display name for the access list. If null, the current name is preserved.

content.description: The new content for the access list with entries separated by newlines. If null, the current content is preserved.

checksum.description: SHA-256 checksum of the new content for integrity verification. If null, it will be automatically calculated.

UpdateCustomAccessListRequest.description: Request model for updating a custom access list.

AccessKey.description: API key passed through the AccessKey header
AccessKey.name: AccessKey
